class Solution:
    def addedInteger(self, nums1: List[int], nums2: List[int]) -> int:
        # Sort the lists to handle duplicate elements
        nums1.sort()
        nums2.sort()
        
        # Iterate through the lists simultaneously
        for i in range(len(nums1)):
            # Calculate the difference between corresponding elements
            diff = nums2[i] - nums1[i]
            
            # If any difference is not equal to the previous ones, return -1
            if i > 0 and diff != nums2[0] - nums1[0]:
                return -1
        
        # If all differences are equal, return the difference
        return nums2[0] - nums1[0]
